item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceAdvertisementsInt $1
item_prototype.description: Delay in seconds between two VRRP advertisements and it is in centiseconds between two VRRPV3 advertisements

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceAuthType $1
item_prototype.description: VRRPv2 supports authentication method to authenticate other peers. VRRPv3 does not support authentication

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceEffectivePriority $1
item_prototype.description: Effective priority for this VRRP instance. Status of interfaces and script results are used to compute this value from the base priority.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceGarpDelay $1
item_prototype.description: Delay to launch gratuitous ARP (GARP).

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceInitialState $1
item_prototype.description: Initial state of this VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceLvsSyncInterface $1
item_prototype.description: If LVS sync daemon is enabled, which interface to use for syncing?

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceName $1
item_prototype.description: Name of the VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceNotifyExec $1
item_prototype.description: Will we execute notification script for this instance?

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstancePreempt $1
item_prototype.description: Will a higher priority advertisement preempt a lower instance?

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstancePreemptDelay $1
item_prototype.description: Delay after startup until preemption can happen. 0 means that there is no delay.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstancePrimaryInterface $1
item_prototype.description: Primary interface of this VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceScript $1
item_prototype.description: Script to execute whenever a state change occurs.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceScriptBackup $1
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the instance becomes backup.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceScriptFault $1
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the instance is in fault state.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceScriptMaster $1
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the instance becomes master.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceScriptStop $1
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the instance is stopped.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceSmtpAlert $1
item_prototype.description: Will SMTP alert be sent for this VRRP instance?

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceState $1
item_prototype.description: Current state of this VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceSyncGroup $1
item_prototype.description: Name of the synchronisation group this VRRP instance belongs, if any.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceTrackPrimaryIf $1
item_prototype.description: Do we track the status of the primary interface?

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceVipsStatus $1
item_prototype.description: Are all VIP of this VRRP instance enabled?

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceVirtualRouterId $1
item_prototype.description: Virtual Router ID (VRID) for this VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpInstanceWantedState $1
item_prototype.description: Wanted state of this VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptCommand
item_prototype.description: Command executed when running the script.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptFall
item_prototype.description: How many times the script should fail before KO.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptInterval
item_prototype.description: Symbolic name of the script.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptName
item_prototype.description: Symbolic name of the script.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptResult
item_prototype.description: Current status of the script.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptRise
item_prototype.description: How many times the script should succeed before OK.

item_prototype.name: vrrpScriptWeight
item_prototype.description: Weight of the script.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupBackup
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the group becomes backup.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupName
item_prototype.description: Name of the synchronisation group.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupNotifyExec
item_prototype.description: Will we execute notification script for this group?

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupScript
item_prototype.description: Script to execute whenever a state change occurs.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupScriptFault
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the group is in fault state.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupScriptMaster
item_prototype.description: Script to execute when the group becomes master.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupSmtpAlert
item_prototype.description: Will SMTP alert be sent for this synchronisation group?

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupState
item_prototype.description: Current state of the synchronisation group.

item_prototype.name: vrrpSyncGroupMemberName
item_prototype.description: Table of instances contained in sync groups.

item_prototype.name: vrrpTrackedInterfaceName
item_prototype.description: Table of tracked interfaces for each VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpTrackedInterfaceWeight
item_prototype.description: Table of tracked interfaces for each VRRP instance.

item_prototype.name: vrrpTrackedScriptName
item_prototype.description: Name of the tracked script.

item_prototype.name: vrrpTrackedScriptWeight
item_prototype.description: Weight of the tracked script.
